name: LELocation
summary: GPS over Bluetooth Smart 4.0 (Low Energy) receiver framework
description:
Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy framework for easy integration of Location and Navigation Service stream reception.
Use LEGPS app on iPhone as transmitter and receive the GPS position in your app with this framework.
